original_text:
The Lord has made himself known; he has executed judgment;
    the wicked are snared in the work of their own hands. Higgaion. Selah
korean_text: 여호와께서 자기를 알게 하사 심판을 행하셨음이여 악인은 자기가 손으로 행한 일에 스스로 얽혔도다 (힉가욘, 셀라)

sentences.original_text: The Lord has made himself known
the wicked are snared in the work of their own hands
sentences.korean_translation: 악인은 자기 손의 행위에 올무에 걸렸다
